name: Simple Start Page
description: A simple, elegant, and customizable start page. Replaces the new tab and sets your homepage to a hosted clone.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; img-src 'self' https: data: blob:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; font-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https://bing.biturl.top https://gist.githubusercontent.com
